Title: The Good Wives Club
Plot: A mummified remains of a woman are found in the abandoned compound. The team discovers that the woman was missing for several months, was wearing a wedding dress when she died, and might've been a victim of a serial killer. The search for the murderer leads them to Florida, where they start looking for another woman who mysteriously disappeared after going to work. One of the clues they have is the old manual for good wifes.
GuestStars: Kate Hodge, Spencer Garrett, Jerry O'Donnell, Matt Carmody, Brian Dietzen, Betsy Brandt, Tara Buck
